CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Change_Order_Status__c,'Requested') || ISPICKVAL(Change_Order_Status__c,'In Progress'), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "",36,36) + " " + "Status:" + " " + TEXT (Change_Order_Status__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(Change_Order_Status__c,'Completed'), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "",36,36) + " " + "Status:" + " " + TEXT (Change_Order_Status__c), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "",36,36)))
CustomField.label: Change Order Indicator
